name: Helm of the Overlord
description: The powerful headpiece of an undead necromancer.

abilities.name: Dominate
abilities.description: Takes control of an enemy non-hero unit, elevating its status to a Creep-Hero, and granting it various stat bonuses. Can dominate ancient creeps.
notes: Cannot dominate Creep-heroes, Siege Creeps, Necronomicon Archer, or Necronomicon Warrior
Dominating a creep while already having one dominated instantly kills the previously dominated creep
Applies a basic dispel on the creep upon cast
Sets the unit's type to Creep-Hero
Sets base movement speed to 380, regardless of its default movement speed
If max health is below the min health threshold, sets current and max health to 1800
Sets gold bounty to 250, overwriting its default bounty
Increases base attack damage, it is not granted as an attack damage bonus
Increases health regen and mana regen
Grants an armor bonus, it is not added to the base armor
If cast on a neutral creep, increases its abilities' by 1 and unlocks their 4th level
Does not restore the creep's mana
The number of max allowed units is bound to the player
When owning both Helm of the Dominator and Helm of the Overlord, Helm of the Overlord takes priority
When the item gets sold or destroyed, the Dominated creep dies
Reinforced units receive less damage from the dominated creep
Does not share cooldowns with Helm of the Dominator

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 462 health and 2.1 health regeneration
252 mana, 1.05 mana regeneration and 2.1% flat base magic resistance
21 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
28.35 main attack damage to universal heroes
